body_html:
Thanks. Regarding this I have a few questions:

  1. If you have a new_http_archive which can be Tensorflow git .zip, rather than using a local_archive how do you run ./configure ? Should I maybe write a gen_rule?

  2. What is io_bazel_rules_closure within the top WORKSPACE file in serving?

I also tried pre-compiling separately tensorflow_cc and creating a include and lib folder, but I some issues including Eigen, which has a BUILD file which calls some other Tensorflow stuff...
body_text:
Thanks. Regarding this I have a few questions:


If you have a new_http_archive which can be Tensorflow git .zip, rather than using a local_archive how do you run ./configure ? Should I maybe write a gen_rule?


What is io_bazel_rules_closure within the top WORKSPACE file in serving?

body:
Thanks. Regarding this I have a few questions:

1. If you have a new_http_archive which can be Tensorflow git .zip, rather than using a local_archive how do you run ./configure ? Should I maybe write a gen_rule?

2. What is io_bazel_rules_closure within the top WORKSPACE file in serving?

I also tried pre-compiling separately tensorflow_cc and creating a include and lib folder, but I some issues including Eigen, which has a BUILD file which calls some other Tensorflow stuff...
